content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the marijampolė district court the case involves a divorce and the division of matrimonial property between the parties involved the court has decided to divide the immovable property including several cars between the parties based on their claims the court has also addressed the issue of spousal maintenance but no claims were brought by either party the court has awarded costs to both parties based on the proportion of their successful claims the court has allowed the applicant to dissolve the marriage due to fault on the part of the defendant the court has ordered the division of the matrimonial property acquired during the marriage including the allocation of specific assets to each party the court has dismissed certain claims regarding the declaration of immovable property as these belong to both parties in equal shares the court has ordered the payment of certain costs by each party

metadata.cost: 6.16 EUR (court fees) + 1'200.94 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant; 1'645.50 EUR (professional fees) + 6.16 EUR (court fees)
